mainEntity.name: What should I do if I'm arrested in Charlotte?

acceptedAnswer.text: Remain silent and request an attorney immediately. Do not discuss your case with anyone except your lawyer. Call Vasquez Law Firm 24/7 at 1-844-YO-PELEO for emergency help.

mainEntity.name: Can a criminal record be expunged in NC?

acceptedAnswer.text: Many criminal records can be expunged in North Carolina. Eligibility depends on the offense type and your criminal history. Vasquez Law Firm can review your record and file for expungement.

## Serving Charlotte and Surrounding Areas
Vasquez Law Firm proudly serves clients throughout Charlotte, Mecklenburg County, and the greater North Carolina area. With offices conveniently located in Charlotte, we're here to help with all your legal needs.


## Why Choose Vasquez Law Firm?
- **Experienced Attorneys**: Over 20 years of combined legal experience
- **Bilingual Services**: We speak English and Spanish
- **Free Consultation**: Call 1-844-YO-PELEO today
- **Proven Results**: Hundreds of satisfied clients
- **24/7 Availability**: We're here when you need us

faqs.question: What should I do if I'm arrested in Charlotte?
faqs.answer: Remain silent and request an attorney immediately. Do not discuss your case with anyone except your lawyer. Call Vasquez Law Firm 24/7 at 1-844-YO-PELEO for emergency help.

faqs.question: Can a criminal record be expunged in NC?
faqs.answer: Many criminal records can be expunged in North Carolina. Eligibility depends on the offense type and your criminal history. Vasquez Law Firm can review your record and file for expungement.
